name: @tagspaces/tagspaces-ws
description: Web Service for creating thumbnails and index used by the TagSpaces application
author: TagSpaces Authors <contact@tagspaces.org>

scripts.build: npx rimraf build && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.test-thumbgen: curl -v -d '["file_path.jpg"]' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer xxx" -X POST http://127.0.0.1:2000/thumb-gen
scripts.test-indexer: curl -d '{"directoryPath":"/Users/sytolk/Pictures/"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer xxx" -X POST http://127.0.0.1:2000/indexer
scripts.npmpack: npm run build && npx shx cp -rL build/** ../../../tagspaces/release/app/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-ws/
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
